item.title: Rashmika trolled heavily for getting confused between Okkadu & Pokiri - 123telugu
item.description:
Rashmika trolled heavily for getting confused between Okkadu & Pokiri

Published on Dec 21, 2024 10:05 am IST

Rashmika Mandanna, after her successful performances in recent films, faced trolling for confusing her first movie experience, stating Ghilli was a remake of Pokiri, when it is actually a remake of Okkadu.

  • Rashmika shared her experience of watching her first film in theatres during an interview.
  • She mistakenly referred to Ghilli as a remake of Pokiri, leading to online backlash.
  • The actress apologized on social media for her error, acknowledging her mistake immediately.
“As soon as I realized I made a mistake, I knew social media wouldn’t spare me. Sorry, sorry, my bad.” - Rashmika Mandanna

This incident highlights the scrutiny public figures face on social media and their responsibility to be accurate in their statements.

item.description:
Honey Singh breaks silence on whether Shah Rukh Khan had slapped him violently during a tour: 'Nobody knows what I'm going to...'

Publication Date: Unknown | Source: Unknown

In a recent statement, Honey Singh addressed ongoing rumors about a violent encounter with Shah Rukh Khan. Singh emphasized that the truth of the event remains obscured.

  • Honey Singh clarifies recent rumors concerning Shah Rukh Khan.
  • The incident purportedly happened during a tour.
  • Singh stresses the uncertainty regarding the events stated in the rumors.
'Nobody knows what I'm going to...'

This disclosure sheds light on the mysteries surrounding the incident and hints at the complexities of celebrity interactions.

item.title: Extra Decent ED Review | A Decent Psycho-Comedy With Inconsistent Humor and a Peculiar Conflict - Lensmen Reviews
item.description:
Extra Decent ED Review | A Decent Psycho-Comedy With Inconsistent Humor and a Peculiar Conflict

Publication Date: December 21, 2024 Source: Signal

Aamir Pallikkal’s new movie Extra Decent presents a peculiar premise with an interesting central conflict, showcasing moments of humor but ultimately struggling to develop its narrative fully.

  • The main character, Binu, is an introverted and shy individual with a troubled relationship with his father.
  • The movie delves into dark humor, questioning conventional morality and familial dynamics.
  • Suraj Venjaramood's performance adds depth to the otherwise inconsistent pacing of the film.
  • While the film has enjoyable moments, it fails to deliver a satisfying conclusion.
“If the final act could have used the premise to deliver something more exciting than the chaotic comedy they pulled off, I think ED would have been much more entertaining and clutter-breaking.”

The film Extra Decent offers a mixed experience with its engaging moments overshadowed by a lack of cohesive storytelling.

item.title: Abhishek Bachchan maintains distance from Aishwarya Rai as she helps...., watch viral video - India.com
item.description:
Abhishek Bachchan Maintains Distance from Aishwarya Rai as She Helps Her Mother

Publication Date: December 21, 2024 Source: India.com

Rumors of Abhishek Bachchan and Aishwarya Rai’s divorce were quieted after the couple was seen at their daughter Aaradhya’s annual day function. However, a viral video shows them maintaining a noticeable distance, stirring curiosity among fans.

  • Abhishek was seen standing apart while Aishwarya helped her mother, Brinda Rai.
  • Despite separation speculations, Aishwarya and Abhishek appeared together at the event.
  • Amitabh Bachchan also attended the function, indirectly addressing divorce rumors in a recent statement.
“Speculations are speculations… they are speculated untruths, without verifications.” - Amitabh Bachchan

The couple married in April 2007 and have a daughter, Aaradhya, born in November 2011.

item.title: Pushpa 2 worldwide box office collection day 16: Allu Arjun’s blockbuster becomes fastest Indian film to break the Rs 1500 crore barrier - The Indian Express
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Breaks Rs 1500 Crore Barrier at Box Office

Date: December 2024 | Source: Indian Express

Pushpa 2: The Rule, starring Allu Arjun, has surpassed the Rs 1500 crore mark globally, making it the fastest Indian film to achieve this milestone within 16 days of release.

  • The film has grossed Rs 1004.35 crore nett in India in just 16 days.
  • It collected Rs 632.50 crore nett in the Hindi market alone within 15 days.
  • Pushpa 2’s success is attributed to its engaging storyline and Allu Arjun’s performance as Pushpa Raj.
  • The film's producers have decided to hold off on an OTT release for 56 days.
  • Upcoming competition includes SRK’s Mufasa and Varun Dhawan’s Baby John.
“Pushpa 2: The Rule is a bonafide blockbuster.”

The film's impressive performance indicates a strong fanbase, even in light of challenges such as Allu Arjun's recent legal issues. Its continued success will be tested against new cinematic releases in the holiday season.

item.description:
Drama Unfolds: Meena Kumari's Ex-Husband's Revenge on Dharmendra

Publication Date: [Insert Date] | Source: [Insert Source]

The article discusses an incident where Meena Kumari's estranged husband allegedly took revenge on Dharmendra for his rumored affair with the actress, resulting in a bizarre public spectacle.

  • Meena Kumari's ex-husband was reported to have taken revenge on Dharmendra.
  • The method used involved dousing Dharmendra in black paint.
  • The incident reportedly stems from jealousy over an alleged affair.
“The unexpected revenge shocked onlookers and raised questions about personal lives intermingling with public personas.”

This unusual event highlights the dramatic and sometimes tumultuous relationships present in the world of entertainment.

item.title: Is Pushpa 2: The Rule all set for OTT release? Allu Arjun-starrer's team shares a new update - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Update on OTT Release for Pushpa 2: The Rule

Date: Dec 21, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

The team of Pushpa 2: The Rule has clarified the timeline for the film's OTT release, announcing it will not be available for streaming until 56 days after its theatrical release.

  • The film, directed by Sukumar, released in theatres on December 5, 2024.
  • The production house Mythri Movie Makers announced through social media that the film will remain exclusive to theaters for 56 days.
  • Fans have expressed their support for the decision, emphasizing the importance of the big-screen experience.
  • Pushpa 2: The Rule is a sequel to the 2021 hit Pushpa: The Rise and has grossed over ₹1004.35 crore nett in India.
“Enjoy the Biggest Film #Pushpa2 only on the Big Screens in this Biggest Holiday Season. It won't be on any OTT before 56 days!” - Mythri Movie Makers

The release strategy aims to maximize theater attendance before transitioning to OTT platforms.

item.title: Bigg Boss 18: Avinash Mishra calls Chum Darang 'most fake contestant'; Vivian Dsena says 'Sab baith ke so - The Times of India
item.description:
Bigg Boss 18: Avinash Mishra calls Chum Darang 'most fake contestant'

Publication Date: Not Specified Source: Not Specified

In the latest drama of Bigg Boss 18, contestant Avinash Mishra has openly criticized fellow housemate Chum Darang, declaring him the 'most fake contestant'. Vivian Dsena added his thoughts, suggesting that Chum is underestimated.

  • Avinash Mishra labels Chum Darang as the 'most fake contestant'.
  • Vivian Dsena expresses that Chum should not be taken lightly.
  • The statement has sparked conversations among fans and contestants.
“Sab baith ke soch rahe ho Chum bholi, goli hai bhai woh” - Vivian Dsena

This controversy highlights the ongoing tensions and rivalries within the Bigg Boss house, keeping viewers engaged and excited for upcoming episodes.

item.title: Barack Obama's Favourite Movies Of 2024 Include THIS Indian Film, Along With Anora, Dune: Part 2 And More - Times Now
item.description:
Barack Obama's Favourite Movies Of 2024 Include THIS Indian Film, Along With Anora, Dune: Part 2 And More

Publication Date: Not specified

Source: Not specified

It's that time of year when former President of the United States Barack Obama shares a list of his favourite movies, books, and music of the year. In 2024, an Indian film topped Obama's annual list and it's none other than Payal Kapadia's Golden Globe-nominated All We Imagine as Light.

Here's the full list:

  • All We Imagine As Light
  • Conclave
  • The Piano Lesson
  • The Promise Land
  • The Seed Of The Sacred Fig
  • Dune: Part Two
  • Anora
  • Didi
  • Sugarcane
  • A Complete Unknown

After Barack shared the list on Instagram, a user congratulated the team of All We Imagine as Light and expressed their pride.

item.title: Pushpa 2 LEAKED Online Amid Reports Of Allu Arjun's Film Being Removed From North Indian Theatres - News18
item.description:
Pushpa 2 LEAKED Online Amid Reports Of Allu Arjun's Film Being Removed From North Indian Theatres

Date: December 21, 2024
Source: News18

Pushpa 2: The Rule, the sequel to the blockbuster Pushpa: The Rise, faces piracy issues just two weeks after its release.

  • The film was leaked online, prompting concerns about piracy.
  • Conflicts arose over showings in North India, leading to temporary removals from theaters.
  • Despite controversy, the film became a box office success, earning over Rs 1,508 crore globally.
  • Allu Arjun has been involved in legal issues following an incident at a theater screening.

“SHOCKING: Pushpa 2⃣ ultra HD leaked online🛑” — Manobala Vijayabalan (@ManobalaV)

The legal and piracy challenges faced by Pushpa 2 highlight ongoing issues in the film industry, despite its commercial success.

item.title: Amitabh Bachchan reacts to Aaradhya's annual day celebrations in school which he attended with Abhishek a - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Amitabh Bachchan Attends Aaradhya's School Celebration: 'It's the Most Exhilarating Experience'

Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

Amitabh Bachchan shared his joy of attending his granddaughter Aaradhya's annual day celebrations at school, expressing his feelings about the experience.

  • Amitabh attended the event along with Abhishek Bachchan and Aishwarya Rai.
  • He described the experience as 'the most exhilarating experience'.
  • The celebration included various performances by the students.
'It's the most exhilarating experience,' said Bachchan about the event.

The event highlights the importance of family and shared moments in celebrating children's achievements.

item.title: Sohail Khan’s uber cool first look from NKR21 unveiled - 123telugu
item.description:
Sohail Khan’s First Look from NKR21 Unveiled

Published on Dec 21, 2024 | Source: OTT

Popular Bollywood actor Sohail Khan will be seen in a negative role in Nandamuri Kalyan Ram’s upcoming action thriller, tentatively titled NKR21. On the occasion of Sohail’s birthday, the makers unveiled his first look from the movie.

  • Sohail Khan looks suave and stylish in a black outfit.
  • His character is described as intense, hinting at a powerful presence.
  • The film is directed by Pradeep Chilukuri and includes notable cast members like Vijayasanthi and Saiee Manjerakar.
  • NKR21 combines action with emotional depth, showcasing Sohail's debut in Tollywood.
“His role as the evildoer and face-off with Kalyan Ram are set to be the movie’s most riveting moments.”

NKR21 aims to deliver an engaging cinematic experience and is highly anticipated due to its star-studded cast.

item.title: WWE SmackDown Results – 12/20/24 (Women’s Tag Titles on the line, and more!) - Wrestleview.com
item.description:
WWE SmackDown Results – December 20, 2024

Publication Date: December 20, 2024 | Source: Wrestleview.com

Location: Hartford, Connecticut (XL Center)

This episode of WWE SmackDown featured exciting matches leading up to the end of the year, including a Women’s Tag Team Championship match and confrontations between major wrestlers.

Key Points:

  • The Bloodline defeated LA Knight, Apollo Crews, and Andrade.
  • Carmelo Hayes won against Braun Strowman via count-out.
  • Johnny Gargano defeated Alex Shelley in a grudge match.
  • The main event featured Bianca Belair and Naomi defending their titles against Nia Jax and Candice LeRae.

Notable Quotes:

“Good match here between Gargano and Shelley. Commercial break and slightly goofy finish aside, a bit of fun seeing this DIY-MCMG feud continue.” — Wrestleview.com

As the year closes, WWE continues to build thrilling storylines and matches, promising an exciting transition into the new year.

item.description:
Pushpa 2 Box Office Collection Day 16: The Allu Arjun Starrer Crosses Rs 1000 Crore at the Box Office

Publication Date: [Insert Date Here]Source: [Insert Source Here]

This article discusses the box office performance of 'Pushpa 2', which has now crossed the significant milestone of Rs 1000 crore in collections, with expectations to surpass 'Baahubali 2'.

  • After 16 days of release, 'Pushpa 2' has achieved a box office collection of over Rs 1000 crores.
  • The film, starring Allu Arjun, is expected to set new records in Indian cinema.

"Pushpa 2 is on track to become one of the highest-grossing films in Indian history."

This growth signifies a positive trend in the Indian film industry, emphasizing the popularity of regional cinema.

item.title: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan shields daughter Aaradhya from flashlights while leaving with Abhishek Bachchan, s - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Aishwarya Rai Bachchan Shields Daughter Aaradhya from Flashlights

Publication Date: October 25, 2023

Source: Times of India

Aishwarya Rai Bachchan was seen shielding her daughter Aaradhya from flash photography while departing with husband Abhishek Bachchan, leading to mixed reactions online.

  • Viewers expressed polarized opinions on whether a 13-year-old should be protected from media attention.
  • The incident sparked discussions about celebrity privacy and the ethics of photographing children.
  • Comments ranged from support for the protective behavior to criticism of the overreaction.
“She is 13, not 3,” commented one user, highlighting the divide in perspectives.

This incident underscores the ongoing debate surrounding celebrity privacy and the protection of minors in the public eye.

item.title: Arjun Kapoor On Boney Kapoor Falling In Love With Sridevi, Leaving Mona Shourie: 'What He Had Done...' - News18
item.description:
Arjun Kapoor On Boney Kapoor Falling In Love With Sridevi, Leaving Mona Shourie: 'What He Had Done...'

Date: December 20, 2024 Source: News18

Arjun Kapoor discusses the divorce of his parents, Boney Kapoor and Mona Shourie, reflecting on how the event shaped his life.

  • Arjun's parents divorced when he was 10, following Boney's relationship with Sridevi.
  • He reveals that while the split was difficult, it did not completely define his childhood.
  • Arjun describes his relationship with his father as complex, affected by Boney's work commitments and the divorce.
  • He emphasizes the importance of maintaining a connection with his father through cinema.
  • Arjun acknowledges a sense of maturity he gained from the experience, having taken on responsibilities at a young age.
“As long as he was happy with what he had done, I was okay with it.” - Arjun Kapoor

In conclusion, Arjun Kapoor illustrates how his parents' divorce influenced his growth, ultimately leading to a stronger bond with his father in later years.

item.title: Ram Kapoor Surprises Fans With A Drastic Weight Loss Transformation | Check Pics Inside - News18
item.description:
Ram Kapoor Surprises Fans With A Drastic Weight Loss Transformation

Date: December 20, 2024

Source: News18

Actor Ram Kapoor wowed his fans with a selfie showcasing his impressive weight loss transformation. After a hiatus from social media, he reemerged looking fit and healthy.

  • Best known for his role in 'Bade Achhe Lagte Hai', Ram Kapoor shared his transformation on Instagram.
  • In a recent outing, he was seen with his wife, Gautami Kapoor, flaunting his new look.
  • Ram hinted that he has lost 42 kgs, although he did not specify the methods used to achieve this.
  • His transformation has drawn admiration and compliments from fans and celebrities alike.
“Hi guys, sorry for the slightly long absence from Insta, was working on myself quite extensively.”

Ram Kapoor's drastic weight loss transformation has both surprised and inspired many of his fans, leading to widespread praise across social media.

item.title: Adrija Roy replaces Alisha Parveen to play new female lead in Anupamaa - India Forums
item.description:
Adrija Roy Takes Over as Female Lead in Anupamaa

Published: Friday, December 20, 2024 at 6:46 PM Source: Star Plus

The popular show Anupamaa continues to make headlines as actress Alisha Praveen, who played the character Rahi, is replaced by Adrija Roy.

  • Alisha Praveen was reportedly surprised and disappointed to be replaced without prior notice.
  • Adrija Roy has been approached to take over the role of Rahi.
  • Adrija has conducted a mock shoot for the character and is poised to step into the role soon.
  • She is known for her previous work in Imlie and Kundali Bhagya.
“I did not leave the show by choice,” - Alisha Praveen on her replacement.

With Adrija's entry into Anupamaa, fans anticipate how her portrayal of Rahi will resonate with the show's audience.

item.title: Anupamaa: Alisha Parveen Claims She Didn’t QUIT But Was Replaced Without Explanation - India Forums
item.description:
Anupamaa: Alisha Parveen Claims She Didn’t QUIT But Was Replaced Without Explanation

Published: Friday, December 20, 2024 at 6:17 PM

Alisha Parveen, who played Raahi in the popular TV show Anupamaa, claims she was abruptly replaced without prior notice or clear reason. She expressed her emotions in an Instagram post, stating her shock and gratitude to fans.

  • Alisha claims she did not voluntarily leave the show.
  • She conveyed her feelings of confusion regarding her replacement.
  • Fans have expressed disappointment over her unexpected exit.
  • The ongoing storyline involves a love triangle with Raahi at its center.
“Hello everyone, I didn’t quit the show #Anupama but I don’t know the reason exactly why this happened... Just thank you everyone who loved me! I will miss this show from the depth of my heart.”

The controversy surrounding Alisha's exit continues to stir discussions among fans and viewers of Anupamaa.

item.title: Exclusive - Bigg Boss 18: Digvijay Singh Rathee joins Salman Khan on WKV after eviction; Karan Veer Mehra - The Times of India
item.description:
Exclusive - Bigg Boss 18: Digvijay Singh Rathee joins Salman Khan on WKV after eviction; Karan Veer Mehra and Chum Darang blame Shrutika Arjun for his elimination

Publication Date: N/A | Source: Times of India

After being evicted from Bigg Boss 18, Digvijay Singh Rathee joins Salman Khan on Weekend Ka Vaar. Fellow contestants Karan Veer Mehra and Chum Darang point fingers at Shrutika Arjun for his exit.

  • Digvijay Singh Rathee participated in Bigg Boss 18.
  • He was recently evicted from the show.
  • Salman Khan hosts Weekend Ka Vaar where he gives insights on the show.
  • Karan Veer Mehra and Chum Darang accuse Shrutika Arjun of playing a role in Rathee's elimination.
“There were many factors that contributed to Digvijay’s elimination, and Shrutika played a significant part in it,” - Karan Veer Mehra.

This season of Bigg Boss continues to surprise with unexpected eliminations and contestant dynamics.

item.title: I have no idea why I have been replaced in Anupamaa: Alisha Parveen - The Times of India
item.description:
Alisha Parveen Discusses Her Unexpected Exit from Anupamaa

Publication Date: N/A | Source: Times of India

Alisha Parveen, who recently played Rahi in the popular TV show Anupamaa, expressed her shock and disappointment regarding her replacement after a short stint in the series.

  • Alisha confirmed she has been removed from Anupamaa, where she worked for just two months following a generation leap.
  • She stated, "It is shocking and disappointing. I am not sure what exactly happened and why I am being replaced!"
  • Alisha emphasized her successful chemistry with co-star Shivam Khajuria and expressed her confusion about the decision.
  • She plans to focus on future projects after this unexpected development.
  • The ongoing plot in Anupamaa involves complex romantic dynamics between characters.
"I had a meeting yesterday and was told about this decision. I am completely clueless but it happens sometimes." - Alisha Parveen

In the competitive world of television, this significant change raises questions about casting decisions and audience engagement in ongoing storylines.

item.title: Ameesha Patel shuts down Anil Sharma's idea of playing mother-in-law in Gadar 2: 'Even for Rs 100 crores, - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Ameesha Patel shuts down Anil Sharma's idea of playing mother-in-law in Gadar 2: 'Even for Rs 100 crores, never!'

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Times of India

Ameesha Patel firmly declined director Anil Sharma's proposal to portray a mother-in-law in the highly anticipated film Gadar 2, stating she would never accept the role even for a hefty sum of Rs 100 crores.

  • Ameesha Patel's strong reaction to playing the mother-in-law role in Gadar 2.
  • She emphasized her dedication to the character of Sita in the first Gadar film.
  • The response hints at her desire to maintain the integrity and essence of her original character.
"Even for Rs 100 crores, never!" - Ameesha Patel

Patel's decision reflects a broader conversation about character portrayal and the evolution of roles for women in cinema.
